Text:
Don't ever trust marketing hyperbole. This is not a "definite edition" by far. This is the 1994 Atlantic co version. It does have 1 thing going for it: it is pre-loudness-war. 
It sounds rather muffled in comparison to the 2008 Re-master. The 2008 Re-master from the boxset 1970-1975 (SACD) is much clearer and sounds like a veil is lifted. So get that one.
